item.title: Assad’s Syria Was Brutal. Will What Comes Next Be Better?
item.description: It is hard not to worry that Syrians’ sense of deep relief today could be followed by a new set of horrors tomorrow.

item.title: Giorgia Meloni Is Ready to Bring Trumpism to Europe
item.description: Giorgia Meloni is ready to be the bridge between Donald Trump and Europe.

item.title: Revolutions Swept the Middle East in 2011. Will Syria’s End Differently?

item.title: Steve Mensch, President of Tyler Perry Studios, Dies at 62
item.description: Mr. Mensch, a longtime supporter of the film industry in Georgia, died in a plane crash on Friday in Florida, according to officials.
